field.name: summary
field.value: Pre-Processor Issue with passing parameters to sub-view

field.name: description
field.value:
Just grabbed the latest bits and I may have found another edge case regarding Brail expressions. Basically this was working before...
-- editForm.brail -- <?brail OutputSubView('/common/defaultFocus', { 'controlIdToFocus':"${division.Name}" }) ?>
-- /common/defaultFocus.brail -- <script type="text/javascript"> Event.observe(window, 'load', function() { ${controlIdToFocus}.focus(); }); </script>
And it seems the latest bits breaks this and I suspect it has to do with the changes in expression handling... Attached are the 2 views and the exception stack...
WORKAROUND: There is a pretty easy workaround for this right now that I'm using as shown below...
-- editForm.brail -- <?brail OutputSubView('/common/defaultFocus', { 'controlIdToFocus':'division.Name' }) ?>
-- defaultFocus.brail -- <script type="text/javascript"> Event.observe(window, 'load', function() { document.getElementById('<?brail output controlIdToFocus ?>').focus(); }); </script>
